name: Lindwurm Cookie Royale
description:
Local multiplayer get the cookie game. Four player on the same keyboard(s) fight for the right cookie.

Controls:

  • Player 1: WASD - Fire with Q
  • Player 2: UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT (Arrow) - Fire with CTRL-right
  • Player 3: TFGH - Fire with R
  • Player 4: IJKL - Fire with U
Source can be found on:
https://github.com/rumpelcoders/LindwurmCookieCave
Build with Libgdx based on the QuickGdx
